Text:
Passworded posts are against the rules on TPB.  Don't it again, or a complaint will be filed.

Sort of stupid use passwords in the first place, don't you think?

It's a public domain document, for pete's sake:

"Copyright (C) 1999-2009 Daniel Diaz
Permission is granted to make and distribute verbatim copies of this manual provided the copyright notice
and this permission notice are preserved on all copies."

So what's the point of a RAR file with a frigging password on it?  Idiot.
